name: Balloon Blast!
description:
How high can you make the balloon float?
Slide the balloon around with your fingers and dodge all kinds of challenges.
Enjoy the game.

Easy to play but hard to master gameplay means you'll be coming back again and again for one more rise up balloon.

Game features.
-Free to play
-Endless gameplay
-One-button gameplay
-Fun, fast physics
-Easy to learn, hard to master
-Earn in-game currency to buy new balloon
-Global rankings.

If you love the game. Give us your feedback: https://www.facebook.com/tutappgames
